spatial_accuracy.notes: Major mismatch between the 2D plan (kitchen + dining room + breakfast area + pantry + utility room + WC + central hall/stair zone + window seat/angled bay) and the 3D render (generic layout with large open area, a bedroom-like room, and multiple small bath-like rooms). Wall layout and room adjacency do not correspond. Door and window locations do not match the plan’s perimeter openings, and key distinctive geometry (angled/window-seat bay) is not preserved.

structural_fidelity.notes: The 3D model omits multiple labeled plan spaces (utility room, WC, pantry, breakfast area, central hall/stairs, window-seat bay) and introduces rooms/partitions not present in the plan. Adjacency relationships (kitchen-to-pantry, kitchen-to-breakfast, dining room boundaries) are not reproduced. Openings are not embedded in the correct walls per the 2D drawing.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture/fixtures in 3D do not map to the 2D plan’s intended kitchen/dining arrangement (e.g., plan shows kitchen with perimeter counters and pantry; 3D shows an island and unrelated room furnishing). Several pieces appear arbitrary relative to the plan and scales are inconsistent with the plan’s room sizes.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Render is visually clean with decent lighting and materials, but it is not a faithful isometric/architectural representation of the provided plan. Some openings read ambiguously and the scene composition is minimal. Geometry is mostly clean, but architectural correctness to the source is poor.

detected_errors.description: Missing Utility Room (plan shows labeled UTILITY ROOM adjacent to kitchen; not present in 3D).
Missing WC (plan shows separate WC near central hall; not clearly present in 3D).
Missing Pantry (plan shows PANTRY beside kitchen; not present in 3D).
Missing Breakfast area (plan shows BREAKFAST area to the right of kitchen; not present in 3D).
Missing Central Hall / stair zone (plan shows CENTRAL HALL and stair/UP area; not represented in 3D).
Missing window-seat/angled bay geometry (plan shows WINDOW SEAT with angled exterior wall; 3D exterior is rectangular without the bay).
Kitchen placement and boundary incorrect (plan kitchen is top-right with specific wall runs and adjacency to pantry/breakfast; 3D kitchen is placed/formed differently).
Dining room layout incorrect (plan dining room is a large rectangular space along the bottom with multiple exterior openings; 3D does not reproduce this room proportion or perimeter openings).
Door placements/orientations do not match plan (plan shows multiple specific door swings between hall/utility/WC/kitchen; 3D door locations are different and several openings are missing).
Window placement incorrect (plan indicates several windows/door openings along dining room and right-side bay; 3D windows are placed differently and do not follow the plan’s distribution).
Room proportions distorted (relative sizes of kitchen/dining/breakfast zones in plan are not preserved in 3D; 3D allocates area to unrelated rooms).
Hallucinated bedroom-like room (3D includes a furnished sleeping area not indicated in the provided 2D plan segment).
Hallucinated bathroom/partition cluster (3D shows multiple small enclosed rooms that do not correspond to the plan’s WC/utility configuration).
